titleStmt.title: The Present and future condition of Germany giving a full account ...

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.

(from t.p.) I. Of the Turks advance into Christendom, and the grounds of those disturbances in Hungary, which occasion'd it -- II. A description of the city of Vienna, and the siege thereof -- III. The grand seignoirs nativity calculated, and the success of this expedition probably conjectured -- IV. Several predictions relating to the present posture of affairs in Europe.
